Instance.description: An interaction that 'parks' a sim at a music production station and prepares the station for producing/remixing a specified music track.

Tunable.name: audio_start_event
Tunable.description: The script event to listen for from animation so we know when to start the music.

Tunable.name: audio_stop_event
Tunable.description: The script event to listen for from animation so we know when to stop the music.

TunableList.name: channels
TunableList.description: A map of channel enums and their associated data.

Tunable.name: channel_name
Tunable.description: The name to display for this channel.

TdescFragTag.name: channel_tests
TdescFragTag.description: The tests to display this channel's remix mixer

TunableVariant.name: music_track_data_snippet
TunableVariant.description: The reference to looping and fixed-length .propx files for the associated music track. (This may be tuned in place here using 'literal' or as a reference to a MusicTrackData tuning snippet.)

TunableTuple.name: literal
TunableTuple.description: A pairing of looping and fixed-length audio tracks to be played and saved from the music production station.

Tunable.name: fixed_length_audio
Tunable.description: The fixed-length propx file of the music track.

Tunable.name: looping_audio
Tunable.description: The looping propx file of the music track.

Tunable.name: reference
Tunable.description: A reference to a MusicTrackData tuning snippet.

Tunable.name: turn_off_channel_display_name
Tunable.description: The name to display for remix mixers that turn off a channel.

Tunable.name: turn_off_channel_icon
Tunable.description: The icon to display in the pie menu for remix mixers that turn off a channel.

Tunable.name: turn_on_channel_display_name
Tunable.description: The name to display for remix mixers that turn on a channel.

Tunable.name: turn_on_channel_icon
Tunable.description: The icon to display in the pie menu for remix mixers that turn on a channel.
